duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive, operate, and maintain firefighting apparatus and equipment in compliance with County Fire Operations Directives.
Respond to fire alarms and emergency calls.
Participate in fire prevention activities and suppression training programs.
Periodically perform the duties of a Captain.
Ensure that assigned apparatus are in safe operating condition.
Obtain and maintain certification in specialties such as Aircraft Rescue Firefighting, Urban Search and Rescue, or Hazardous Materials Technician.
Maintain a valid CA and ICEMA Paramedic license or a CA EMT Certification.
Abide by the non-smoking provision of the San Bernardino County Professional Firefighters Memorandum of Understanding.

education_certification.credential: Current and valid San Bernardino County Fire Department Level II Certification
CA Class C license with a Firefighter Endorsement and current DL546 Health Questionnaire
